title: IF
description: Evaluates a logical condition. If TRUE, returns value_if_true. If FALSE, returns value_if_false_optional (if provided); otherwise returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

parameters.name: … value_if_true
parameters.description: The value returned when the condition is TRUE.

parameters.name: value_if_false_optional
parameters.description: The value returned when the condition is FALSE.

examples:
IF(Probability > 80, "High",
   Probability > 40, "Medium",
   "Low")
-- Returns "High" if Probability > 80.
-- Returns "Medium" if Probability > 40.
-- Otherwise, returns "Low".
